description:
Founded in 2012, Master of Project Academy taught 50,000+ IT & Business professionals in more than 170 countries around the world.

Now, Master of Project Academy's exclusive & premium courses are in Udemy!

Do Not Waste Your Time and Money! Enroll in the most comprehensive online Agile Project Management and Scrum Framework training.

  • More than 5,000 students enrolled world-wide
  • 10+ Hours of Comprehensive Content
  • Lifetime access is provided once you enrolled in the course
  • In case of dissatisfaction, you will be able to claim a full-refund in 30 days after your purchase


You do not have to pay a lot for Agile Project Management and Scrum Framework Training. By taking this course, you will enroll in the training based on your schedule anywhere and anytime you wish.

Change of technology is at the pace of it was never before. Market conditions, harsh competition and time-to-market are biggest concerns of today's organizations, especially for technology companies. In order to adapt this fast changing environment, most of the organizations adapt Agile Project Management methodologies. This enables the organizations to produce valuable outputs faster. And Scrum Framework is the most popular Agile Methodology.

Because of this shift in project management methodology, organizations seek for Agile Practitioners, Scrum Masters, Agile and Scrum Professionals to manage their software development projects. Take this opportunity to learn Agile Project Management and Scrum Framework, earn a new skill, get an Agile & Scrum Certification and take a head ahead in your career.

You will get a course completion certification at the end of the course!

Course starts with the definition of methodology, framework and process. Then in 3rd Section, birth of Agile, Agile Manifesto and Agile Principles are described. Need for Agile is described then. Also, other popular Agile methodologies like Kanban, Lean and Extreme Programming are described briefly.

From 4th Section onward, Scrum Framework is described in detail. Scrum Team, Scrum Events and Scrum Artifacts are described with their sub-topics and each concept is explained through a real-life project example to illustrate the Scrum Framework in your minds better.

To get the most out of the Agile methodologies, Scrum/XP Hybrid and Scrumban methodologies use mixture of Scrum and XP, and Scrum and Kanban respectively. These two embraces are described in 5th Section.

And, 6th Section of the course provides information, prerequisite and details about 3 Most Popular Agile & Scrum Certification Organizations: PMI, Scrum Alliance and Scrum.Org.

By taking this course, you will be very well prepared for following Agile and Scrum Certifications:

Certified Scrum Master (CSM)

Certified Scrum Developer (CSD)

Certified Scrum Product Owner (CSPO)

Professional Scrum Master-I (PSM I)

Professional Scrum Master-II (PSM II)

Professional Scrum Developer-I (PSD I)

Professional Scrum Product Owner-I (PSPO I)

Professional Scrum Product Owner-II (PSPO II)

PMI - Agile Certified Practitioner

Note that, this course:

Qualifies for the 21 Contact Hours Agile Training requirement of PMI for the PMI-ACP certification.

Provides 15 SEUs under Category E: Independent Learning of Scrum Alliance

Besides, practices of Agile Project Management and Scrum Framework are explained over real-life project examples.

YOU WILL BE ABLE TO UNDERSTAND THE AGILE PROJECT MANAGEMENT CONCEPTS AND SCRUM FRAMEWORK EASILY WITH REAL-LIFE EXAMPLES.

Each section includes several questions in quizzes with their rationales and explanations.

Now, Enroll in this course and Master in Agile Project Management and Scrum Framework!

Note: If you are a PMP, you can submit 14 PDUs by enrolling in this course.
title: Agile Project Management-Scrum Framework-Certification Prep
